attributes.action: A referendum for the new European Treaty before Mr Blair signs away our rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of the UK demand the right to a referendum before Mr Blair and his government hand over yet more power to Brussels without consulting the British voters.

Please sign up to this petition to stop Mr Blair and his government completely distroying this country, we have hardly any rights left, we are becoming strangers in our own country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
